creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
description: Sculptural abstraction featuring an elliptical red object that fills most of the picture plane; its center consists of a grey circle with interweaving yellow lines; heavy black lines around the object's center spiral outwards towards its border; a chain-like, turquoise design adorns background. Print with hand-drawn additions
medium: Lithograph, with additions in graphite, black and red pastel and rubber stamp on paper; working proof
provenance: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis; Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1986.
signed: On verso: FOLD OUT (WORKING PROOF - JN 4)
title: Fold-Out
